casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

August 10, 2007

[Cite as 08/10/2007 Case Announcements, 2007-Ohio-4057.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2007-0781. Ohio Consumers’ Counsel v. Pub. Util. Comm.

Public Utilities Commission, No. 05-1444-GA-UNC. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Public Utilities Commission of Ohio. Upon consideration of the motion for admission pro hae vice of David C. Rinebolt by Coleen L. Mooney and the motion for leave to intervene as appellee of Ohio Partners for Affordable Energy,

It is ordered by the court that the motions are granted.
